Errant Magazine Website

UX/UI, Front-end, WordPress

Grey Vaisius and I designed and developed the website for Errant Magazine. We made wireframes, visual designs, prototypes, and built a WordPress theme for publishing long-form articles, photo essays, and poetry. We included a reference manual.
